name: npc_dota_hero_abyssal_underlord
bio_loc:
Neither myth nor song exist to tell of their coming.

Deep below the surface of the world lay unknown wonders and horrors. Down and down again, well beneath the slithering magma fields and simmering roots of dormant volcanoes stands the obsidian city of Aziyog, its incomparable stonework spanning an endless cavern. Within honeycomb walls mortared with the bones of countless slaves lies the domain of the Abyssal Horde, and their brutal underlord Vrogros.

Armed by the monstrous forgemasters of his kind and well-practiced in the arts of the Dark Rift, Vrogros is able to conjure forth flame and crippling malice through the twist between worlds. He seeks always to expand his holdings, destroying or enslaving all he encounters. Yet the lands offered by the subterranean realm are few, and so his sights have turned upward. By his command the first waves of abyssal invaders have already marched through the rift, a few doomed legions meant merely to test the might of nations above. Now, as his full force readies itself for unending conquest, Vrogros himself steps into a sunlit world to announce his coming reign. Those who face the Underlord will bow and pay tribute, or be crushed where they stand.
hype_loc: Conjure waves of abyssal flame to immolate enemies held paralyzed in your spiteful grip. Feast upon the carnage of battle, gaining strength as foes perish around you, their attacks diminished by your very presence. Tear a rift in reality to teleport yourself and your teammates across the map, delivering bloody retribution to any who would defy the will of Vrogros the Underlord.
npe_desc_loc: Teleports his team in and out of battle

facets.description_loc: Underlord's attacks cleave while he has bonus damage from Atrophy Aura.
facets.name: abyssal_underlord_demons_reach

abilities.name: abyssal_underlord_firestorm
abilities.desc_loc: Calls down waves of fire that damage enemy units in the target area, burning for additional damage over time.
abilities.lore_loc: The flames of conquest blaze forth from the darkest depths of the abyss.
abilities.shard_loc: Firestorm can be allied targeted. When used that way, the Firestorm follows the hero around.  The wave count is increased, and tick rate / duration time occur more quickly.

abilities.name: abyssal_underlord_pit_of_malice
abilities.desc_loc: A deadly pit is conjured at the target location; any unit that enters will be damaged and rooted. Each enemy unit within the pit are affected by the root only every %pit_interval% seconds.
abilities.lore_loc: Twisting into the seams of reality itself, Vrogros' manifest hatred paralyzes those who defy his will.
abilities.scepter_loc: Increases radius of the Pit of Malice.

abilities.name: abyssal_underlord_atrophy_aura
abilities.desc_loc: Nearby enemy units are weakened, losing a portion of their base damage. If an enemy dies while under this effect, Underlord gains temporary bonus damage.
abilities.lore_loc: To merely stand in the presence of the Underlord is to feel the conviction of battle sapped from one's soul.
notes_loc: Break disables the Attack Damage Reduction aura and prevents Underlord from gaining new stacks.
facets_loc: Underlord's attacks cleave while he has bonus damage from Atrophy Aura.

abilities.name: abyssal_underlord_raid_boss
abilities.desc_loc: After an allied hero Teleports, they temporarily gain Damage Reduction and Movement Speed. Allies receive %dark_portal_multiplier%x bonuses if teleporting via Fiend's Gate.

abilities.name: abyssal_underlord_dark_portal
abilities.desc_loc:
Opens 2 portals, one next to Underlord and one in the target location. Heroes can channel a portal for %warp_channel_duration% seconds to teleport to the other side. Portals have to be at least %minimum_distance% away from each other.

Double-click to teleport to your team's base, in front of your fountain.
abilities.lore_loc: They come without warning, leaving fire and blood where kingdoms once flourished.
abilities.scepter_loc: Summons a Pit of Malice around each of the portals. Reduces cooldown.
facets_loc: Underlord summons uncontrollable demonic Warriors and Archers after travelling through the Fiend's Gate that attack nearby enemies. These units deal %underling_building_damage_reduction_tooltip%%% damage to buildings.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_underlord_9
talents.name_loc: Fiend's Gates deals {s:bonus_dps} DPS in a {s:bonus_radius} radius

abilities.name: abyssal_underlord_abyssal_horde
abilities.desc_loc:
After teleporting through the Fiend's Gate, Underlord brings forth a Warrior or an Archer to aid him every %underling_spawn_interval%s that last for the duration of the Fiend's Gate.

The Warrior burns mana every hit, and deals magical damage to whoever kills it. The Archer has a passive movement and attack speed aura.
